name: Facility Billing Arrangement
title: FBA
definition: Indicates a special arrangement has been negotiated between the host customer of a higher level service and the subsequent customer of the lower level service.

validEntry.description: Indicates the requirement of split billing on the

validEntryNotes:
An entry in one or more of positions 2 through 4 is required when position 1 is "D". 
The following define element labels%3A   EF %3D Entrance Facility  DT %3D Direct Transport  MUX %3D Multiplexing
usageNotes:
Required when the ACT field is "N", "C" or "T" and the ACNA field is different from the ACNA associated with the facility  ( CFA and/or SCFA )  and the UNE and CC fields are not populated. 
Optional  w hen the ACT field is "R" and the ACNA field is different from the ACNA associated with the facility  ( CFA and/or SCFA )  and the UNE and CC fields are not populated. 
Otherwise prohibited.
